abstract: Declining oil prices sent energy shares down and sales forecasts from technology companies fell below analysts’ estimates.
snippet: Declining oil prices sent energy shares down and sales forecasts from technology companies fell below analysts’ estimates.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell for the second consecutive day, buffeted by declining oil prices that sent energy shares down and by sales forecasts from technology companies that fell below analysts’ estimates.

headline.main: Shares Fall on Technology Sales Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on Technology Sales Forecasts
